Hello friends. Here is the beta-version  of the Clown Dating Sim I've been working on. 

It's not really meant to be good as this is more of me trying out new things. This is my first visual novel ^^

Uh, I'm currently not super motivated to complete it but if you want to help with art or something shoot me a message (because once you play it, you'll know why LOL). Also, please let me know if you encounter any bugs (ex. pronouns not working, seeing achievements that you haven't earned yet) and typos.

 Brief warning: This is just for fun but there is some content that I give warnings for in-game. In general, it's PG-13.  

Content:

  • 3 dateable clowns
  • 9 endings + 1 secret ending
  • achievements!! 
  • bad puns!
  • meme references!
  • poorly drawn backgrounds!

Clowns:

  • 2 unique dates

  • 3 unique dates
